backend/main.mo: Defines core types for bookings, providers, rentals, and user profiles with compare helpers and in‑memory maps for storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting an older actor state to a newer structure by adding verification logs and preserving existing maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file providing root container and loading the main React module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up all application routes using TanStack Router, mapping services, bookings, rentals, profile, provider, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Admin‑only access denied screen showing a warning and link back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic session handling and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireLogi: Wrapper component that prompts unauthenticated users to log in before accessing protected content.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Renders a badge with label and variant based on booking status from the backend.
Renders a clickable EYEGIC logo linking to home with size/style variants for header or default.
frontend/src/components/forms/Availabili: Provides date or date-range selection with time inputs and outputs a formatted availability string.
frontend/src/components/forms/MobileNumb: Handles 10‑digit phone input, OTP sending, verification, and triggers a submit callback once verified.
frontend/src/components/forms/MockOtpVer: Simulates a 4‑digit OTP flow with mock generation, validation, resend, and verification UI.
frontend/src/components/forms/OptionalPh: Allows optional image upload with preview and removal, notifying parent of file changes.
frontend/src/components/forms/RepairIssu: Renders checkboxes for selecting multiple repair issue types and updates the selected list.
frontend/src/components/icons/WhatsAppIc: SVG component rendering the WhatsApp logo with customizable styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/header/Ad: Notification bell showing pending admin verifications and navigating to the notifications page.
frontend/src/components/layout/header/My: Profile button showing completion percentage and linking to the profile page.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Defines a generic page layout with optional title/description and configurable max-width.
frontend/src/components/layout/RootLayou: Wraps the app with header, footer, and an Outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays footer with navigation links, contact actions, branding, and build info.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header component handling navigation, login/logout, admin controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/profile/FrameSha: SVG icon components representing different eyewear frame shapes.
Frame shape selection UI using checkboxes and corresponding icons.
frontend/src/config/buildInfo.ts: Exports build identifier from environment variables.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useMobileNumber: Fetches mobile number verification logs via actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useIsCallerAdmin: Checks whether the current caller is an admin via actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useBooking.t: Fetches a single booking by ID using actor.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateOpt: Creates a mobile optician booking and invalidates customer bookings cache.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRen: Creates a rental booking and invalidates customer bookings cache.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRep: Creates a repair booking and refreshes related booking queries.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCustomerB: Fetches all bookings for the current customer.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useGetBookin: Alternate hook for fetching a single booking by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useLogMobile: Logs a mobile number verification event via actor.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useProviderB: Fetches bookings assigned to the current provider.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useUpdateBoo: Updates a booking’s status and invalidates related caches.
Empty placeholder for site logo hook.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useCallerUser: Fetches the current user's profile with loading state adjustments.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useProfileCom: Fetches and normalizes the user's profile completion percentage.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useProfilePic: Mutations for uploading profile and prescription pictures with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useSaveCaller: Saves user profile data and updates profile-related caches.
Fetches provider details for the logged-in identity.
frontend/src/hooks/rentals/useRentalCata: Fetches the catalog of rental items via actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and exposing auth state to the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and shared UI utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNotificati: Admin page showing mobile verification logs, gated by admin access and rendered in a sortable table.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/BookingDetai: Shows detailed booking information including status, pricing, and service metadata, requiring user login.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/mobile-optic: Shows confirmation details for a mobile optician booking, handling invalid IDs, loading state, and navigation.
Multi‑step form for creating a mobile optician booking, including OTP verification, service selection, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Displays the logged-in user's bookings with status, schedule, location, and total price, with loading and authentication handling.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/rentals/Rent: Displays confirmation details for a rental booking with pricing breakdown and navigation options.
Form for creating a rental booking, selecting rental days, entering address, calculating price, and submitting.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/repairs/Repa: Shows confirmation and details for a repair request, handling invalid IDs, loading errors, and requiring login.
Page for submitting a repair booking with OTP verification, repair type selection, and form details before creating a booking.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the landing page with services, handles mobile OTP verification, and navigates users to service flows.
frontend/src/pages/profile/MyProfilePage: User profile page allowing editing personal info, frame preferences, and uploading profile and prescription pictures.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderDash: Provider dashboard showing provider info, upcoming bookings, and tools for updating booking statuses.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderOnbo: Provider onboarding form collecting personal details, service areas, availability, and required verifications.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalItemDet: Rental item detail page displaying item info, availability, pricing, and navigation back to the rental catalog.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalsCatalo: Displays the rental catalog with search and category filtering and lists items with availability status.
frontend/src/pages/services/MobileOptici: Shows details of the mobile optician service with features and a booking button.
Intro page explaining eyewear rentals with benefits, imagery, and navigation to the catalog.
Describes eyewear repair services, lists available repairs, and links to booking.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides utility functions to format INR currency values.
frontend/src/utils/homeOtpSession.ts: Manages session state for home-flow OTP verification, including set, get, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with session storage support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains validators for phone numbers, email, and PIN codes along with sanitization helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file defining feature requirements, pending requests, and restoration tasks for admin notifications and profile completion behavior.
